mapper.select: select lm_maintenance_records.id, lm_maintenance_records.user_id, lm_maintenance_records.device_id, lm_maintenance_records.device_repair_apply_id, lm_maintenance_records.start_time, lm_maintenance_records.end_time, description, result, lm_maintenance_records.university_id, lm_maintenance_records.datetime, lm_maintenance_records.by_who, lm_maintenance_records.deleted from lm_maintenance_records, lm_lab_device where lm_maintenance_records.device_id = lm_lab_device.device_id and lm_lab_device.lab_id = #{labId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and lm_lab_device.deleted = false and lm_maintenance_records.deleted = false
